returnusererroraction.errortext: You cannot send this purchase order for approval because you currently have no assigned supervisor. Please take steps to have a supervisor added to your employee record, and try again.

initcondition.formula: ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1","PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3") ) OR (( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type4") ) AND (( isEmpty("Linking Sales Order") = 'F' AND "Total" > "Linking Sales Order:Projected Cost" ) OR ( "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 1 OR "Total" > 50000.00 )))

( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND (( isEmpty("Linking Sales Order") = 'F' AND "Total" <= "Linking Sales Order:Projected Cost" ) OR ( isEmpty("Linking Sales Order") = 'T' )) AND ( "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 0 AND "Total" <= )) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2") AND "Total" <= 500.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" > 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" > 10000.00 )

( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" <= 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" <= 10000.00 ) OR (( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type5") ) AND ( "Total" <= 100000.00 OR "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 1 ))
"Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND ( "Total" > 10000.00 OR "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 1 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" > 50000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" > 25000.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Total" > 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Total" > 10000.00 )
"Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1","PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3") AND isChecked("Workflow:Required CFO Approval") = 'F'
